fu.util

Class ByteRecordWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • fu.util.ByteRecordWriter

  • public class ByteRecordWriter
extends java.lang.Object
    ByteRecords are very memory efficient containers for field-oriented data. This class allows to write into such a structure. The output is a byte[].
